name: Sophia Chen
persona: Sophia Chen is a 21-year-old Biochemistry major with a strong academic record and a CGPA of 3.77. She is highly conscientious and motivated, setting ambitious grade goals for herself and working diligently to achieve them. Sophia demonstrates excellent self-discipline, rarely procrastates, and is persistent even when faced with challenging coursework. While she occasionally feels nervous before exams, her solid self-efficacy and perseverance help her manage stress effectively. Sophia is driven by a passion for scientific discovery and hopes to pursue graduate studies after completing her undergraduate degree.
